page.title: 18RECREATION IN PERTH
page.content:
Perth today is a major recreational centre. Over the years it has hosted many major sports tournaments ( for example, badminton and curling. ) Indeed, it is on the site of the legendary Battle of the Clans (the North Inch) that the main centre of recreational activity stands.{ { BELL'S SPORTS CENTRE}, gifted to the city by the Gannochy Trust (a memorial to A.K.Bell,founder of the trust) was opened in 1968 at a cost of Â£250,000. This unique and modern building, which has a floor area of 32,000 square feet, provides facilities for many sports, including tennis, badminton, table_tennis, archery, weight_lifting, football, hockey, etc. and is used by approximately 350,000 people per year.
